item.title: Simple Programming Jokes
item.description: Life of a Programmer in Simple Jokes That Will Make You Laugh You don’t have to be a programmer to laugh at their humor. Credit: gfycat.com Programmers code all day, debug all night and go through thousands of code lines. But it doesn’t mean programming is what they all know and good at. They all have a sense of humor that can make us all laugh even if we’re not a programmer.
